hadiths.text: Abis b. Rabi'a reported:I saw 'Umar (Allah'be pleased with him) kissing the Stone and saying: I am kissing you and I know that you are a stone. And if I had not seen Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) kissing you, I would not have kissed you

chapter.ara-name: باب اسْتِحْبَابِ تَقْبِيلِ الْحَجَرِ الأَسْوَدِ فِي الطَّوَافِ
chapter.eng-name: It is recommended to kiss the black stone during circumambulation (Tawaf)
